# Images

Creation, manipulation and display of LED images.

```cards
images.createImage(`
. . . . .
. . . . .
. . # . .
. . . . .
. . . . .
`);
images.createBigImage(`
. . . . .
. . . . .
. . # . .
. . . . .
. . . . .
`);
```

### See Also

[createImage](/reference/images/create-image), [createBigImage](/reference/images/create-big-image)
